name: Neon runner (Unfair Gospel)
description:
Neon Runner is a casual infinite runner game where you collect coins, powerups and dodge obstacles along the way. This game was made in Unreal 4.  I created this game so I could get used to Unreal and understand how it works. Hope you enjoy it!

Left & right - A & D

Slam/Slide - S

Jump - Space

Arrow keys also work!

System Requirements

OS: Windows 10

Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor

GPU: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56

Memory: 8GB RAM

Storage:  170MB available space
